cards.name: Jojen Reed
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After Jojen Reed stands, reveal the top card of each player's deck. You may either: discard each of those cards, or have each player draw 1 card.
cards.flavor: "With two eyes you see my face. With three you could see my heart."

cards.name: The Wolf King
cards.text: [stark] character only. Attached character gains the King trait and does not kneel when declared as an attacker in a [military] challenge.
cards.flavor: What should he fear? He was the Young Wolf, King of the Trident and the North.

cards.name: King Renly's Host
cards.text: Intimidate. No attachments. While there is a Summer plot card revealed, King Renly's Host gets +4 STR. While there is a Winter plot card revealed, King Renly's Host cannot be declared as an attacker.

cards.name: Caswell's Keep
cards.text: Reaction: After you reveal a plot card, choose a player. Look at the top 2 cards of that player's deck. Place 1 of those cards on the bottom of that deck, and the other on top.
cards.flavor: Lord Caswell's keep was scarcely tall enough to call a tower, but the country was low and flat and Catelyn could see for leagues in all directions.

cards.name: Shadow Tower Mason
cards.text: No attachments except Weapon. While you control 3 or more [thenightswatch] locations and/or attachments, Shadow Tower Mason gains a [military] and an [intrigue] icon.

cards.name: The Haunted Forest
cards.text: While The Haunted Forest is standing, it contributes 1 STR to your side during any challenge in which you are the defending player. Forced Reaction: After you lose a challenge, kneel The Haunted Forest.

cards.name: Stannis Baratheon
cards.text: During [power] challenges, each participating non-King character gets -1 STR. Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a non-loyal character. That character cannot stand during the standing phase this round.

cards.name: Red God's Blessing
cards.text: Attached character gains the R'hllor trait and gets +1 STR for each R'hllor character you control.
cards.flavor: "Azor Ahai has come again! All hail the Warrior of Light! All hail the Son of Fire!" <cite>Melisandre</cite>

cards.name: Tanda Stokeworth
cards.text: Reaction: After you marshal Tanda Stokeworth, each player gains 3 gold.
cards.flavor: Since the hour he had arrived in the Red Keep, Lady Tanda had been stalking him, armed with a never-ending arsenal of lamprey pies, wild boars, and savory cream stews.

cards.name: Without His Beard
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, discard up to 3 cards at random from the losing opponent's hand. Then, that player draws 2 cards.
cards.flavor: Shaving him was the cruelest thing Tyrion could have done...

cards.name: Aeron Damphair
cards.text: Reaction: After a character is saved, either: stand it, or kneel it.
cards.flavor: "Listen! Listen to the waves! Listen to the god!"

cards.name: King Balon's Solar
cards.text: Reaction: After you win initiative, gain 1 gold.
cards.flavor: The solar was as damp and drafty as ever.

cards.name: Pyat Pree
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Pyat Pree is participating, search the top X cards of your deck for a [targaryen] attachment or event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. X is the STR by which you won the challenge.
cards.flavor: "Come with me to the House of the Undying, and you shall drink of truth and wisdom."

cards.name: Vaes Tolorro
cards.text: Interrupt: When a character with 1 or more power is killed, kneel Vaes Tolorro to move 1 power from that character to Vaes Tolorro. (Up to 2 power instead if that character's STR is 0.)
cards.flavor: ...in the place they named Vaes Tolorro, the city of bones.

cards.name: Elia Sand
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, choose a character. Until the end of the phase, that character gains stealth. (Limit twice per phase.)

cards.name: Burning on the Sand
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose an unopposed challenge, set the claim value on the winning opponent's revealed plot card to 0 until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Jaqen H'ghar
cards.text: Reaction: After Jaqen H'ghar enters play, place a Valar Morghulis token on up to 3 different unique characters. If Jaqen H'ghar leaves play, discard those tokens from play. Reaction: After you win a challenge in which Jaqen H'ghar is attacking alone, choose and kill a character with a Valar Morghulis token.

cards.name: Isle of Ravens
cards.text: Action: Kneel Isle of Ravens to choose a card in any player's discard pile, and shuffle it into its owner's deck.

cards.name: King Beyond the Wall
cards.text: Wildling character only. Attached character gains the King trait. While attached character is attacking a player with a higher power total than you, raise the claim value on your revealed plot card by 1.

cards.name: Valar Morghulis
cards.text: When Revealed: Kill each character.
